comment: It might be beneficial to get off the internet and go mingle in society with people of any race now.... Let's go, folks.
amr:

                  :ARG0 (a / and

                        :op2 (g2 / go-02

                                          :mod (a2 / any)))))))

      :ARG0 (f / folk)
